#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
string a,b;
int t,i;
cin>>t;
int count[26];
while(t--)
{
fill(count,count+26,0);
cin>>a>>b;
if(a.size()!=b.size())
{
cout<<"NO"<<endl;
continue;
}
for(i=0;i<a.size();i++)
{
count[a[i]-'a']++;
count[b[i]-'a']--;
}
int ok=1;
for(i=0;i<26;i++)
{
if(count[i]!=0)
{
cout<<"NO"<<endl;
ok=0;
break;
}
}
if(ok)
cout<<"YES"<<endl;
}
}
